txt.en: Use every Suspicious Wall in the caverns
Destroy every Pile of Bones in the caverns

The caverns below The Forsaken Inn are filled with all manner of objects and dangers requiring the expertise of a wide range of classes. Complete the instance having used every Trap Mechanism, Suspicious Wall, and Incantation Stone and having destroyed every Pile of Bones.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: Because not all areas of the caverns are accessible in Tier 1, this quest must be completed on Tier 2.</rgb>
Use every Trap Mechanism in the caverns
Complete the instance having used every Trap Mechanism, Suspicious Wall, and Incantation Stone and having destroyed every Pile of Bones.
Use every Incantation Stone in the caverns
